title.b: Prohibit the use of Mobile Clients

concept.shortdesc: Some organizations may consider the use of mobile Sametime client a security risk and therefore want to prohibit users from using the mobile client to connect to their Sametime ecosystem. The following policy is used to control this behavior:

title.codeph: Policy id = im.2010 (allow mobile client), Default Setting: ON

section.p: If an administrator wishes to prohibit the user of the mobile clients they can set this policy to OFF. When a login via a mobile client is attempted the user will received a message stating mobile clients are not allowed.
